meanings.definition: Scatter among or between other things
meanings.sent1: She intersperses colorful flowers in her garden.
meanings.sent2: The artist intersperses different shapes in the painting.
meanings.sent3: The chef intersperses herbs in the dish for added flavor.
meanings.sent4: The stars interspersed in the night sky like diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The teacher intersperses fun activities in the lesson to keep students engaged.

meanings.definition: Insert at intervals in something else
meanings.sent1: He intersperses jokes throughout his speech.
meanings.sent2: The author intersperses quotes in the book to emphasize points.
meanings.sent3: The magician intersperses tricks in his performance to amaze the audience.
meanings.sent4: The singer's voice interspersed with the melody beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The runner intersperses sprints with jogs to improve endurance.
